description: Tavily is an AI-powered search tool designed to help users quickly find accurate, relevant, and up-to-date information from the web.
name: tavily
title: Tavily

properties.description: The search query that was executed.
properties.name: query

properties.description: A short answer to the user's query, generated by an LLM. Included in the response only if include_answer is requested.
properties.name: answer

properties.description: List of query-related images.
properties.name: images

items.description: List of query-related images.

properties.description: A list of sorted search results, ranked by relevancy.
properties.name: results

items.description: A list of sorted search results, ranked by relevancy.

properties.description: The title of the search result.
properties.name: title

properties.description: The URL of the search result.
properties.name: url

properties.description: A short description of the search result.
properties.name: content

properties.description: The relevance score of the search result.
properties.name: score

properties.description: Time in seconds it took to complete the request.
properties.name: response_time

properties.name: query
properties.label: Query

properties.description: The category of the search.
properties.name: topic
properties.label: Topic

options.description: general-purpose searches that may include a wide range of sources
options.label: General

options.description: real-time updates
options.label: News

properties.description: The depth of the search.
properties.name: search_depth
properties.label: Search Depth

options.description: provides generic content snippets from each source
options.label: Basic

options.description: retrieves the most relevant sources
options.label: Advanced

properties.description: The time range back from the current date to filter results.
properties.name: time_range
properties.label: Time Range

options.description: returns results from the past 24 hours
options.label: Day

options.description: returns results from the past 7 days
options.label: Week

options.description: returns results from the past 30 days
options.label: Month

options.description: returns results from the past 365 days
options.label: Year

properties.description: The maximum number of search results to return.
properties.name: max_results
properties.label: Max Results

properties.description: Include an LLM-generated answer to the provided query.
properties.name: include_answer
properties.label: Include Answer

properties.description: Perform an image search and include the results in the response.
properties.name: include_images
properties.label: Include Images

actions.description: Extract web page content from one or more specified URLs.
actions.name: extract

properties.description: A list of extracted content from the provided URLs.
properties.name: results

items.description: A list of extracted content from the provided URLs.

properties.description: The URL from which the content was extracted.
properties.name: url

properties.description: The full content extracted from the page.
properties.name: raw_content

properties.description: This is only available if include_images is set to true. A list of image URLs extracted from the page.
properties.name: images

items.description: This is only available if include_images is set to true. A list of image URLs extracted from the page.

properties.description: A list of URLs that could not be processed.
properties.name: failed_results

items.description: A list of URLs that could not be processed.

properties.description: The URL that failed to be processed.
properties.name: url

properties.description: An error message describing why the URL couldn't be processed.
properties.name: error
